p.d: The body of 91 year-old James Crawley is found attached to a post and dressed in his military uniform. An elaborate staging that suggests an execution. Inspector ÉloIse Gentil heads the investigation with her father Robert, a war historian, with whom she's been on difficult terms for twenty years... Directed by: Claude-Michel Rome (France, 2018) Screenplay: Claude-Michel Rome Cast: Claire Borotra (ÉloIse Gentil), Jean-François Balmer (Jacques Maréchal), Michel Jonasz (Robert Gentil), Claire Chazal (Évelyne Leroy-Vidal), Pierre Deny (Pierre-Yves Kerdal), Frédéric Amico (LoIc Jourdan) Genre: detective
